{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Buffalo |model=WSR-600D |revision=HP |upc= |ean= |asin=B00OL61RBU;JP; |newegg=N82E16833162151 |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/31/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WRTR-308N |manuf_rev=v0.1 |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=FDI000000029 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621S |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model=SPI |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM68B16CWQH-25H |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT5592EP;RT5592EPL; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7603E;MT7603EN; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=high power |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware=Padavan (unofficially) |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=Buffalo-A-XXXX, Buffalo-G-XXXX |default_ssid_regex=^Buffalo-A-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}$,,, ^Buffalo-G-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}$, |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=CC:E1:D5 |oui_eth=CC:E1:D5 }} {{TagLine|Buffalo AirStation N600 Gigabit DualBand Wireless Router}} :[http://buffalo.jp/product/wireless-lan/ap/wsr-600dhp/ Product page] (JP)
"WRTR-308N_V01", "19K-P13-0000R" and "RoHS" :is silkscreened on the board in the images. *OEM: [[Gemtek]] WRTR-308N (v0.1)
===Devices=== ====[[List of Buffalo Devices - Wireless Routers]]==== *[[Buffalo AirStation WSR-600DHP]] :'''Buffalo WSR-600DHP''' (''2.4GHz/11n, 5GHz/11n'') :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621S @880MHz Single-core (0103) :Flash: 16MB (SPI), RAM: ''EtronTech'' 64MB (DDR2) :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7603E, [[Ralink]] RT5592EP *[[Buffalo WHR-600D]] *[[Buffalo WZR-600DHP]] *[[Buffalo WZR-600DHP2]] *[[Buffalo WZR-900DHP]] *[[Buffalo AirStation WSR-1166DHP]] :'''Buffalo WSR-1166DD''' FCC ID: FDI000000028 :'''Buffalo WSR-1166DHP''' (''2.4GHz/11n, 5GHz/11ac'') :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621A @880MHz Dual-core (0103) :Flash: 16MB (SPI), RAM: 128MB (DDR3) :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7603E, [[MediaTek]] MT7612E
